data.text: @frozen @Lidsville May I suggest you find some deserted island to move to so that you will be 'safe' from the world.

@brittbak @frozen Already saw a selfish prick with his face out in a shop with "masks required" sign & FREE masks at the door. Staff & customers asked him to mask up. He put on a belligerent song & dance & left saying "I'll come back later". I took that to mean "when the female staff are alone." https://t.co/sEwR1yleq9

@frozen @brittbak Right?!? I’m honestly terrified to leave my home starting tomorrow. Facebook has been brutal. I lost it on a few people because I couldn’t just block them. Lol I needed to let the anger out 😂
@jdempseydesigns @brittbak I've blocked maybe 50 such trolls today on Twitter. Unfortunately, the real world trolls are much harder to block. Whatever this decision was based on, it wasn't kindness.
@brittbak @frozen I know. I’ve already got people being ass holes to me because I’m going to be continuing to wear a mask.
@frozen I think her middle finger is about all I see...
@frozen And now the abuse will ramp up. From the unmasked towards the masked and towards businesses that choose to keep the mandate.
